ne ondræd þu ðe
gelyf for an.
WSCp MARK 5.37 And he ne let him ænigne fyligean buton Petrum & Iacobum & Iohannem, Iacobes broðor.
WSCp MARK 5.38 & hi comon on þæs heahealdres hus,
& he geseah mycel gehlyd wepende & geomriende.
WSCp MARK 5.39 And þa he ineode, he cwæð,
hwi synd ge gedrefede & wepað;
Nis þis mæden na dead
ac heo slæpð.
WSCp MARK 5.40 Ða tældon hi hine;
He þa eallum ut adrifenum; Nam Petrum & þæs mædenes modor, & þa ðe mid him wæron,
& inneodon suwiende þar þæt mæden wæs.
WSCp MARK 5.41 & hire hand nam & cwæð,
thalimthacumi þæt is on ure geþeode gereht,
mæden þe ic secge
aris.
WSCp MARK 5.42 & heo sona aras & eode;
Soðlice heo wæs twelf wintre,
& ealle hi wundredon mycelre wundrunge.
WSCp MARK 5.43 & he him þearle bebead þæt hi hyt nanum men ne sædon
& he het hire etan syllan.
WSCp MARK 6.1 And þa he ðanon eode he ferde on his eðel,
& him folgodon his leorningcnihtas.
WSCp MARK 6.2 & gewordenum restedæge he ongann on gesamnunge læran
& manege gehyrdon & wundrodon on his lare & cwædon,
hwanon synd þyssum ealle þas ðincg
and hwæt is se wisdom þe him geseald is, & swylce mihta þe ðurh his handa gewordene synd?
WSCp MARK 6.3 Hu nys þys se smið Marian sunu, Iacobes broðor, & Iosepes, & Iude & Simonis;
Hu ne synt his swustra her mid us;
& þa wurdon hi gedrefede.
WSCp MARK 6.4 Þa cwæð se hælend,
soðlice nis nan witega buton wurðscipe, buton on his eðele & on his mægðe, & on his huse?
WSCp MARK 6.5 And he ne mihte þar ænig mægen wyrcan, buton feawa untrume onasettum his handum he gehælde.
WSCp MARK 6.6 & he wundrode for heora ungeleafan;
He ða lærende þa castel beferde.

WSCp MARK 6.7 & him twelfe togeclypode, & agan hi sendan twam & twam, & him anweald sealde unclænra gasta. WSCp MARK 6.8 & him bebead þæt hi naht on wege ne namon buton gyrde ane, ne codd ne hlaf, ne feoh on heora gyrdlum. Ac gesceode mid calcum & þæt hi mid twam tunecum gescrydde næron.
WSCp MARK 6.10 And he cwæð to him,
swa hwylc hus swa ge ingað, wuniað þar oð þæt ge utgan.
WSCp MARK 6.11 & swa hwylce swa eow ne gehyrað; þonne ge þanon ut gað asceacað þæt dust of eowrum fotum, him on gewitnesse.
WSCp MARK 6.12 And utgangende hi bodedon þæt hi dædbote dydon.
WSCp MARK 6.13 & hi manega deofolseocnessa utadrifon, & manega untrume mid ele smyredon & gehældon.
WSCp MARK 6.14 And þa gehyrde Herodes se cyng þæt;
Soþlice his nama wæs swutol geworden
& he cwæð,
witodlice Iohannes se fulluhtere of deaðe aras,
& on him synd forþam mægenu geworht.
WSCp MARK 6.15 Sume cwædon
he is Elias,
sume cwædon
he is witega, swylce an of þam witegum.
WSCp MARK 6.16 Ða Herodes þæt gehyrde he cwæð,
se Iohannes þe ic beheafdode se aras of deaðe.
WSCp MARK 6.17 Soðlice Herodes sende & het Iohannem gebindan on cwerterne, for þære Herodiadiscan his broðor lafe Philippus, for þam ðe he nam hi.
WSCp MARK 6.18 Þa sæde Iohannes Herode,
nys þe alyfed to hæbbenne þines broðer wif.
WSCp MARK 6.19 Ða syrwde Herodias ymbe hine & wolde hine ofslean
& heo ne mihte.
WSCp MARK 6.20 Soðlice Herodes ondred Iohannem & wiste þæt he wæs rihtwis & halig,
& he heold hine on cwerterne,
& he gehyrde þæt he fela wundra worhte
& he luflice him hyrde.
WSCp MARK 6.21 Þa se dæg com Herodes gebrydtide he gegearwode mycele feorme his ealdormannum, & þam fyrmestum on Galilea.
WSCp MARK 6.22 & þa ða þære Herodiadiscan dohtor inneode & tumbode, hit licode Herode, & eallum þam ðe him mid sæton;
Se cing cwæð þa to ðam mædene,
bide me swa hwæt swa þu wylle
& ic þe sylle.
WSCp MARK 6.23 And he swor hire,
soðes ic þe sylle swa hwæt swa þu me bitst, þeah þu wylle healf min rice.
WSCp MARK 6.24 Ða heo ut eode heo cwæð to hyre meder,
hwæs bidde ic;
þa cwæþ heo,
Iohannes, heafod þæs fulluhteres.
WSCp MARK 6.25 Sona þa heo mid ofste inn to þam cinincge eode, heo bæd & þus cwæð,
ic wylle þæt ðu me hrædlice on anum disce sylle Iohannes heafod.
WSCp MARK 6.26 Þa wearð se cinincg geunret for þam aðe, & for þam ðe him mid sæton;
Nolde þeah hi geunretan. WSCp MARK 6.27 Ac sende ænne cwellere & bebead þæt man his heafod on anum disce brohte;
